property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Path to namenode directory where namespace metadata is stored on disk.

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Path to datanode directory where block data is stored on disk.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: Default block replication. The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created. The default is used if replication is not specified.
